languages.text: ...приказал{mf||а} расстрелять мертвый корабль издали. Ибо то, что рождено в огне, в огне же должно и сгинуть.
...gave the order to fire upon the dead vessel at range. For that which was born in fire should also perish in fire.
languages.original_text: ...приказал{mf||а} расстрелять мертвый корабль издали. Ибо то, что рождено в огне, в огне же должно и сгинуть.

traits.locale_text: ...gave the order to fire upon the dead vessel at range. For that which was born in fire should also perish in fire.
...gave the order to fire upon the dead vessel at range. For that which was born in fire should also perish in fire.
...gave the order to fire upon the dead vessel at range. For that which was born in fire should also perish in fire.
...gave the order to fire upon the dead vessel at range. For that which was born in fire should also perish in fire.

languages.text: ... dio la orden de disparar a la nave muerta desde lejos. Lo nacido del fuego debe morir en el fuego.
languages.original_text: ...gave the order to fire upon the dead vessel at range. For that which was born in fire should also perish in fire.

traits.locale_text: ... dio la orden de disparar a la nave muerta desde lejos. Lo nacido del fuego debe morir en el fuego.

languages.text: ……下令朝那艘飞船的残骸开火。在烈焰中诞生的造物，也应当在烈焰之中消亡。
languages.original_text: ...gave the order to fire upon the dead vessel at range. For that which was born in fire should also perish in fire.

traits.locale_text: ……下令朝那艘飞船的残骸开火。在烈焰中诞生的造物，也应当在烈焰之中消亡。

languages.text: …射程距離にいるボロボロの宇宙船に向けて発砲するよう命令を出した。火の中で生まれたものは、また火の中で滅びるはずだ。
languages.original_text: ...gave the order to fire upon the dead vessel at range. For that which was born in fire should also perish in fire.

traits.locale_text: …射程距離にいるボロボロの宇宙船に向けて発砲するよう命令を出した。火の中で生まれたものは、また火の中で滅びるはずだ。

languages.text: ... erteilte den Befehl, das tote Schiff unter Beschuss zu nehmen. Denn was im Feuer geboren wird, soll auch im Feuer vergehen.
languages.original_text: ...gave the order to fire upon the dead vessel at range. For that which was born in fire should also perish in fire.

traits.locale_text: ... erteilte den Befehl, das tote Schiff unter Beschuss zu nehmen. Denn was im Feuer geboren wird, soll auch im Feuer vergehen.

languages.text: ... donna l'ordre de faire feu sur l'épave, pour lui offrir une fin flamboyante et digne de son nom.
languages.original_text: ...gave the order to fire upon the dead vessel at range. For that which was born in fire should also perish in fire.

traits.locale_text: ... donna l'ordre de faire feu sur l'épave, pour lui offrir une fin flamboyante et digne de son nom.

languages.text: ...Menzildeki ölü gemiye ateş açılmasını emretti. Nitekim ateşten doğan, ateşin içinde zail olmalıdır.
languages.original_text: ...gave the order to fire upon the dead vessel at range. For that which was born in fire should also perish in fire.

traits.locale_text: Menzildeki ölü gemiye ateş açılması emrini verdi. Nitekim ateşten doğanın kaderi, ateşin içinde sonlanmalıdır.
